body.p: Touching the “Digital” button icon on the Home Screen displays the “Digital” Screen.

The Digital Screen displays the Digital Values screen as shown above. There is a red or green indicator at the beginning of each row to indicate normal (green) and abnormal (red) states. The first column is the description of the digital value’s alarm or abnormal state. The second column describes the status of the alarm or abnormal state listed in the first column.
The third column is the date/timestamp of when the alarm or abnormal state occurred.
